thread.title: Wrap up warm! 'Scandinavian shiver' to bring sleet, snow and biting winds
thread.title_full: Wrap up warm! 'Scandinavian shiver' to bring sleet, snow and biting winds

title: Wrap up warm! 'Scandinavian shiver' to bring sleet, snow and biting winds
text: Wrap up warm! 'Scandinavian shiver' to bring sleet, snow and biting winds Independent.ie A 'Scandinavian Shiver' will bring sleet, snow and biting winds today as winter's icy grip takes hold.  news/wrap-up-warm-scandinavian-shiver-to-bring-sleet-snow-and-biting-winds-35443544.html  news/article35443375.ece/384e0/AUTOCROP/h342/DGfrostwindow.jpg Drivers and cyclists are being warned to be especially careful on untreated surfaces. Pedestrians are also warned pavements could be icy (Stock) A 'Scandinavian Shiver' will bring sleet, snow and biting winds today as winter's icy grip takes hold. Share Wrap up warm! 'Scandinavian shiver' to bring sleet, snow and biting winds Independent.ie A 'Scandinavian Shiver' will bring sleet, snow and biting winds today as winter's icy grip takes hold.  news/wrap-up-warm-scandinavian-shiver-to-bring-sleet-snow-and-biting-winds-35443544.html
